_header: Man in heaven it is merry to dwell
_description: The Joy of Heaven and how to win it, by Johannes Mydwyntyr — 75 long lines in couplets

BLHar2383.First Lines:
MAn in heuyn hyt ys mery to dwellffyrste the wey & seth the
                    ioye y woll the tell…
BLHar2383.Last Lines:
…Graunte vs to dwell in heuen in þat ioyfull
                    placeÞat hyt so be amen amen for charyte
BLHar2383.Editions:
Bowers,  Robert Hood. 
             “Middle English Poems by Mydwynter.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         64 (1949): 454-61: 455-9.
